NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription.name: NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription
NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to Bluetooth.
NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription.warning: If your app has a deployment target earlier than iOS 13, add the NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription key to your app’s Information Property List file in addition to this key.

NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription.name: NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription
NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting the ability to connect to Bluetooth peripherals.
NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access Bluetooth peripherals and has a deployment target earlier than iOS 13.

NSCalendarsUsageDescription.name: NSCalendarsUsageDescription
NSCalendarsUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s calendar data.
NSCalendarsUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access the user’s calendar data.

NSRemindersUsageDescription.name: NSRemindersUsageDescription
NSRemindersUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s reminders.
NSRemindersUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access the user’s reminders.

NSCameraUsageDescription.name: NSCameraUsageDescription
NSCameraUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s camera.
NSCameraUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access the device’s camera.

NSMicrophoneUsageDescription.name: NSMicrophoneUsageDescription
NSMicrophoneUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s microphone.
NSMicrophoneUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access the device’s microphone.

NSContactsUsageDescription.name: NSContactsUsageDescription
NSContactsUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s contacts.
NSContactsUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access the user’s contacts.

NSFaceIDUsageDescription.name: NSFaceIDUsageDescription
NSFaceIDUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting the ability to authenticate with Face ID.
NSFaceIDUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access Face ID.

NSDesktopFolderUsageDescription.name: NSDesktopFolderUsageDescription
NSDesktopFolderUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to the user’s Desktop folder.

NSDocumentsFolderUsageDescription.name: NSDocumentsFolderUsageDescription
NSDocumentsFolderUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to the user’s Documents folder.

NSDownloadsFolderUsageDescription.name: NSDownloadsFolderUsageDescription
NSDownloadsFolderUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to the user’s Downloads folder.

NSNetworkVolumesUsageDescription.name: NSNetworkVolumesUsageDescription
NSNetworkVolumesUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to files on a network volume.

NSRemovableVolumesUsageDescription.name: NSRemovableVolumesUsageDescription
NSRemovableVolumesUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to files on a removable volume.

NSFileProviderPresenceUsageDescription.name: NSFileProviderPresenceUsageDescription
NSFileProviderPresenceUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs to be informed when other apps access files that it manages.

NSFileProviderDomainUsageDescription.name: NSFileProviderDomainUsageDescription
NSFileProviderDomainUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to files managed by a file provider.

NSGKFriendListUsageDescription.name: NSGKFriendListUsageDescription
NSGKFriendListUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app needs access to their Game Center friends list.

NSHealthClinicalHealthRecordsShareUsageD.name: NSHealthClinicalHealthRecordsShareUsageDescription
NSHealthClinicalHealthRecordsShareUsageD.description: A message to the user that explains why the app requested permission to read clinical records.
NSHealthClinicalHealthRecordsShareUsageD.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access the user's clinical records.

NSHealthShareUsageDescription.name: NSHealthShareUsageDescription
NSHealthShareUsageDescription.description: A message to the user that explains why the app requested permission to read samples from the HealthKit store.
NSHealthShareUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access the user’s heath data.

NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription.name: NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription
NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription.description: A message to the user that explains why the app requested permission to save samples to the HealthKit store.
NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that update the user’s health data.

NSHomeKitUsageDescription.name: NSHomeKitUsageDescription
NSHomeKitUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s HomeKit configuration data.
NSHomeKitUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access the user’s HomeKit configuration data.

NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip.name: NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s location information at all times.
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip.warning: This key is required if your iOS app uses APIs that access the user’s location information at all times.

NSLocationUsageDescription.name: NSLocationUsageDescription
NSLocationUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s location information.
NSLocationUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your macOS app uses APIs that access the user’s location information.

NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription.name: NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s location information while the app is running in the foreground.
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your iOS app uses APIs that access the user’s location information while the app is in use.

NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription.name: NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user's location at all times.DeprecatedFor apps deployed to targets in iOS 11 and later, use NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription instead.
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your iOS app uses APIs that access the user’s location at all times and deploys to targets earlier than iOS 11.

NSAppleMusicUsageDescription.name: NSAppleMusicUsageDescription
NSAppleMusicUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s media library.
NSAppleMusicUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access the user’s media library.

NSMotionUsageDescription.name: NSMotionUsageDescription
NSMotionUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s motion data.
NSMotionUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access the device’s motion data, including CMSensorRecorder, CMPedometer, CMMotionActivityManager, and CMMovementDisorderManager. If you don’t include this key, your app will crash when it attempts to access motion data.

NSFallDetectionUsageDescription.name: NSFallDetectionUsageDescription
NSFallDetectionUsageDescription.description: A message to the user that explains the app’s request for permission to access fall detection event data.
NSFallDetectionUsageDescription.warning: If your app uses the CMFallDetectionManager, the app requires this key.

NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription.name: NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription
NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the local network.

NSNearbyInteractionUsageDescription.name: NSNearbyInteractionUsageDescription
NSNearbyInteractionUsageDescription.description: A request for user permission to begin an interaction session with nearby devices.

NSNearbyInteractionAllowOnceUsageDescrip.name: NSNearbyInteractionAllowOnceUsageDescription
NSNearbyInteractionAllowOnceUsageDescrip.description: A one-time request for user permission to begin an interaction session with nearby devices.

NFCReaderUsageDescription.name: NFCReaderUsageDescription
NFCReaderUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s NFC hardware.
NFCReaderUsageDescription.warning: You’re required to provide this key if your app uses APIs that access the NFC hardware.

NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription.name: NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription
NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting add-only access to the user’s photo library.
NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that have write access to the user’s photo library.

NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription.name: NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s photo library.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that have read or write access to the user’s photo library.

NSUserTrackingUsageDescription.name: NSUserTrackingUsageDescription
NSUserTrackingUsageDescription.description: A message that informs the user why an app is requesting permission to use data for tracking the user or the device.

NSAppleEventsUsageDescription.name: NSAppleEventsUsageDescription
NSAppleEventsUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting the ability to send Apple events.
NSAppleEventsUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that send Apple events.

NSSystemAdministrationUsageDescription.name: NSSystemAdministrationUsageDescription
NSSystemAdministrationUsageDescription.description: A message in macOS that tells the user why the app is requesting to manipulate the system configuration.
NSSystemAdministrationUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that manipulate the system configuration.

NSSiriUsageDescription.name: NSSiriUsageDescription
NSSiriUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting to send user data to Siri.
NSSiriUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that send user data to Siri.

NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription.name: NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription
NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting to send user data to Apple’s speech recognition servers.
NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that send user data to Apple’s speech recognition servers.

NSVideoSubscriberAccountUsageDescription.name: NSVideoSubscriberAccountUsageDescription
NSVideoSubscriberAccountUsageDescription.description: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s TV provider account.
NSVideoSubscriberAccountUsageDescription.warning: This key is required if your app uses APIs that access the user’s TV provider account.
